00020 //---------------------------------------------------------
00021 //   Tempo Event
00022 //---------------------------------------------------------
00023 
00024 struct TEvent {
00025       int tempo;
00026       int tick;            // new tempo at tick
00027       double time;         // precomputed time for tick in sec
00028 
00029       int read(QDomNode);
00030       void write(Xml&, int) const;
00031 
00032       TEvent() { }
00033       TEvent(int t, int tk) {
00034             tempo = t;
00035             tick = tk;
00036             time = 0.0;
00037             }
00038       };

00047 typedef pstl::ipmap<TEvent* >::const_reverse_iterator criTEvent;
00048 
00049 class TempoList : public pstl::ipmap<TEvent* > {
00050       int _tempoSN;           // serial no to track tempo changes
00051       bool useList;
00052       int _tempo;             // tempo if not using tempo list
00053       int _relTempo;          // rel. tempo (100 == 1.0)
00054 
00055       void normalize();

00057       void change(int tick, int newTempo);
00058       void del(iTEvent);
00059       void del(int tick);
00060

00069       int tempo(int tick) const;

00071       double tick2timeLC(int tick, int* sn) const;
00072       double tick2time(int tick, double time, int* sn) const;
00073       int time2tick(double time, int* sn = 0) const;
00074       int time2tick(double time, int tick, int* sn) const;
00075       int tempoSN() const { return _tempoSN; }
00076       void setTempo(int tick, int newTempo);
00077       void addTempo(int t, int tempo);
00078       void delTempo(int tick);
00079       void changeTempo(int tick, int newTempo);

00081       int tick2samples(int tick);
